name: Nokia Playlist File
summary: Learn about .NPL files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: To create a playlist with Nokia Multimedia Player, select File â†’ Save playlist.
NOTE: Nokia Multimedia Player has been discontinued and is no longer available for download.

description: Playlist of media files created with Nokia Multimedia Player, a media playback program included in the Nokia PC Suite; may include references to audio and video files, as well as multimedia message files, but does not contain the actual referenced files themselves.
